column1: Several  spells  of  showers  will  occur  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coast  extending  from  Puttalam  to
Matara  via  Colombo  and  Galle.  Showers or thundershowers  may occur  at  several places  in the
other sea areas around the Island.
